description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to support the GoL in improving the efficiency, equity and shock responsive function of selected Social Assistance programs and, in the event of an Eligible Crisis or Emergency, to provide immediate and effective response to said Eligible Crisis or Emergency.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section II C.1 | Description :Withdrawal conditions relating to Cash Transfers as described in the FinancingAgreement
Finance Agreement :Section II D.1 | Description :Withdrawal conditions relating to the DLIs as described in the Financing Agreement
No withdrawal shall be made under Category (2) unless the Recipient has established the PIU with a composition and terms ofreference acceptable to the Association.

title.narrative: PDI 1: Number of non-eligible beneficiaries eliminated from the OAP roster.
Number of meetings of the Social Protection Technical Committees for Childhood and Old Age
Number of meetings of the Social Protection Technical Committees for Childhood and Old Age
PDI 3: Percentage of households receiving PA that are in poorest two quintiles of the population.
PDI 2: Percentage of households receiving CGP that are in the poorest two quintiles of the population.
PDI 4: Number of beneficiaries receiving emergency top ups to the CGP
Percentage of OAP beneficiaries with a yearly proof of life verification

actual.value: All accounts in the OAP has had a PoL in Nov 2019-January 2020. 100% of OAP pensioners on the June 2021 paylist were seen in personand the new MIS GOLSABS system has been upgraded to require pensioners to be seen once per year from now on. It was launched andused for the payroll in June 2021.

title.narrative: Percentage of existing beneficiaries (in Year 1) of OVC and PA recertified using the harmonized targeting procedures adopted in Year 1
Percentage of new beneficiaries of PA and OVC entered in the calendar year selected using the harmonized targeting procedures adopted in Year 1

actual.value: OVC: 100% (2047 new beneficiaries selected using NISSA)PA: 0% (no new beneficiaries)

title.narrative: A new more secure payment system is developed, including different modalities, and a pilot is implemented

actual.value: Second phase of enhanced cash pilot was implemented in Mohale’s Hoek 9-13 November 2020. In Qacha’s Nek, 25-31 October 2020 therewas continuation of data cleaning.Contract with digital providers drafted but not yet signed.

title.narrative: Number of annual meetings of the Social Protection Policy Committee
Percentage of community councils in the country covered by NISSA-CBT registry
Percentage of payments to CGPand PA paid through the unified payment system
Number of cross cheks between OAP database and Civil Service Pension databases.
Percentage of OVC and CGP beneficiary children who hold the unique ID number provided by Home Affairs (percentage)
Beneficiaries of Safety Nets programs - Unconditional cash transfers (number)
Beneficiaries of Safety Nets programs - Female (number)
An Integrated Managemeent Information System is adopted by MoSD for CGP, OVC, and PA

target.value: An MoSD Integrated MIS (IMIS) for the CGP, OVC and PA has been deployed and is fully operative

actual.value: CGP and OVC Bursary modules have been developed for the new IMIS. The PA modules are currently being developed.

title.narrative: Percentage of beneficiaries reporting satisfaction with the administration of social assistance programs
Number of beneficiaries receiving emergency top ups to the CGP
CERC activated before end of project
Percentace of citizens reporting satisfaction with the administration of social assistance programs
The CGP program has in place standard operating procedures to guide vertical and horizontal scale ups in response to shocks

actual.value: Consultants has finalized the report, awaiting and Government adoption. The MoSD has drafted an MoU to be signed with DMA to agreeon the roles and responsibilities in the implementation of the procedures.
